price: (Noa) kaa sε: Nea sԑ Ͻpԑ a ͻde (asotwee no) bεba mosoͻ no deε Ɔne Nyankopͻn, na montumi nnsi (saa asotwee no) ho kwan”.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā yatīkum bihi al-lahu in shāa wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
